name: artistry
description: - overall app structure and ui.  - jest testing and ESlint usage.  - client form validation.  - client style and animations.  - code tyding-up, modularizing.  - multipart/form request handling.  - registration form.  - posts form.  - profile modification form and server side.  - websocket integration for live feed refresh.

scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && cd server && npm install && cd ..
